contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For project collaboration, please feel free to reach me out by email at:

website.title: Website
website.intro:
Build with Vue.js, using IBM Plex font, using icon from Teenyicons.

Inspired by Web Desktop and here some curated list of it:

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.content:
v1.8.1

  • Replace the blog thumbnail using image from WordPress CDN
  • Component improvement:
    • Thumbnail

v1.8.0

  • Handle multiple project image using slideshow
  • Double click within the Popup to maximize it
  • New component:
    • Slideshow
  • Component improvements:
    • Popup
    • Knob
    • Icon

v1.7.0

  • Fetching Tumblr and WordPress API for mobile version
  • Component improvements:
    • Box
    • Thumbnail
  • New components:
    • Shimmer
    • ShimmerGroup

v1.6.2

  • Component improvements:
    • Knob:
      • Icon position adjustment
    • Popup:
      • Enhance inactive style
      • Adding overlay when dragged to prevent unexpected hover

v1.6.1

  • Layout improvement:
    • Prevent dragging the whole Popup container out of Wrapper

v1.6.0

  • Different behaviour on small screen
  • New components:
    • Knob
    • Expand
    • BottomBar
    • Thumbnail
    • BottomMenu

v1.5.0

  • Bug fixing:
    • Can't back to initial position if Popup closed
  • Layout improvements:
    • Different CSS style for active and inactive Popup
    • Show warning message in small screen
  • New component:
    • Announcement

v1.4.1

  • Improve drag performance

v1.4.0

  • Show notification when the network goes offline

v1.3.0

  • Visitor can change wallpaper
  • New component:
    • Color

v1.2.1

  • Bug fixing:
    • z-index between Popup not working properly
    • Popup can't back to previous position after click minimize icon.

v1.2.0

  • Ability to set Popup position manually
  • Component improvements:
    • Popup
    • Post
  • New component:
    • Box

v1.1.0

  • Adding realtime clock
  • Component improvements:
    • TopBar
    • Popup

v1.0.0

  • Stable release
